Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our databases.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 10/07/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 30/09/2024 12:00 UTC
Service impact : A 1 minute downtime is expected.
Service improvement : We are going to upgrade MySQL 5.7 to MySQL 8.0
The goal of this maintenance is to improve the performance and enhance the security of our infrastructure.

The upgrades will occur every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday.
Progress will be posted here.

The maintenance work will be carried out in 2 phases.
The first phase will begin on:
Start time : 10/07/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 25/07/2024 12:00 UTC

The second phase will begin on:
Start time : 12/08/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 30/09/2024 12:00 UTC
Progress will be posted here.

Thank you for your understanding.
